page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content: The educational needs of the school-aged children in our block are served by Longhoughton Church of England(Controlled)School.The school accomodates children up to and including the age of nine,and has a roll of approximately 200.Most of the children are from R.A.F.families,often remaining for only one year.The large number of these children,however, enables the Educuation Authority to keep the school open.The small number of local children from outlying farms and villages are transported to Longhoughton by taxi. Older children attend Lindisfarne Middle School, and The Duchess High School,situated in Alnwick,seven miles away. A playgroup and a nursery are financed by the R.A.F.There is a small fee charged per child per day.
